src/parallel/zsc-src/vgrid.f File Reference

Detailed Description

Creates a virtual cartesian grid (2D) linking all MPI-allocated processors. The domain limits corresponding to each processor [(xl,xu),(yl,yu)] are assigned and the rank of each processor and its neigbors in all streaming directions are obtained. By default the processor network is periodic and reordered for faster communication
Note:
Some MPI implementations do not reorder correctly. This may affect the performance but not the results.
Warning:
If you use OpenMPI (v1.2.5) you may have to comment out 'USE MPI' and use instead 'INCLUDE "mpif.h"' because a current bug in OpenMPI prevents the command MPI_CART_CREATE() from being recognized.
